casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
Anwar H. BELTON, a/k/a Hason Belton, Hason Lyon, Anwar Belton, Anwar Beltron, Defendant-Respondent. C-886 September Term 2017
080583 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 21, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000971-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
